This is better discussed on the mailing list, where more people will see it.  Thousands of people are able to do this successfully, but I don't know what is going wrong for you.

I'll just note that in general you should never set GOROOT.

When you say that the program doesn't exit, what do you mean?  It just hangs there doing nothing?  How do you stop it?

Also, how did you install Go?
